headline: Gartner (IT): Reassessing Valuation After Major Investor Exit and New Growth Concerns
summary: Gartner (NYSE:IT) has drawn renewed investor attention after a respected investment firm exited its position. The firm cited slower revenue growth and limited margin expansion in the future. Analyst commentary has also flagged contracting web traffic and softer contract-value growth trends. See our latest analysis for Gartner. Gartner’s share price has come under significant pressure this year, dropping more than 51% year-to-date and reflecting both softer demand signals and profit concerns...
